name: Douglas Odell
byline: Software developer, technology strategist, and team leader
intro: Well-rounded software developer with proficiency in React and TypeScript. 10+ years of experience as both a team leader and collaborator. Always striving to balance great UX with stakeholder needs and efficient development practices.

entries.title: Software Developer
accomplishments: Developed intuitive, responsive, and maintainable web apps for financial service professionals using modern JavaScript libraries (including React) in both Agile/SCRUM and Kanban environments
Created shared React component library for UI assets across various apps and websites as part of corporate rebranding effort
Developed a platform for web-based business intake forms with legacy system integration using React and VB.NET
Migrated corporate website from legacy .NET app to CMS-supported site using GatsbyJS, GraphQL, Contentful, and Netlify
Provided technical leadership to a team of front-end developers, including oversight of vendor and contractor development projects
Contributed to design and development of networking app for financial professionals to connect based on common interests using React
Enhanced user experience for CMS platforms including Contentful, OpenText WMS, and SharePoint Online

entries.title: Freelance Web Developer/Designer
accomplishments: Designed and developed CMS-supported brochure websites for small businesses using Wordpress, Wix, and Squarespace
Consulted on user experience, design, and implementation for small business websites

entries.title: Supervisor, Web Services & Usability
accomplishments: Led website development and maintenance strategy for client portal, employee intranet, and corporate website
Managed, mentored, hired, and professionally supported team of front-end developers of varying skill levels and experience
Supported team through corporate restructuring, rebuilding tech organization while ensuring ongoing support of websites and applications

entries.title: Web Production Specialist
accomplishments: Administered CMS and supported development for client portal, employee intranet, employee directory and corporate website
Provided indispensable customer service to internal clients through a high-volume web request queue (ServiceNow)
